mapper.select: select cno, ctitle, ccontent, cpersoncount, cprice, caddress, cstartdate, cenddate, cdday, cstarttime, cendtime,chitcount,cround,mid, classes.ctno, ctname from classes, category where cno=#{cno} and classes.ctno= category.ctno
mapper.update: update classes set chitcount=chitcount+1 where cno=#{cno}
